data.name: Runscore
data.detailed_description:
(Currently on Version 0.1) - Better graphics etc will come before release on (Version 1.0)

Runscore is a survival score based game, about destroying enemies.
Enemies give different points depending on the current level.
After each level a boss room appears in your way.
Destroy everything in your way and get to the Endless UFO mode.
In Endless Ufo mode your goal is to get as high score as possible.

*4 Levels with a bonus easter egg level
*3 Bosses
*Achievement

data.short_description: Runscore is a survival score based game, about destroying enemies. Enemies give different points depending on the current level. After each level a boss room appears in your way. Destroy everything in your way and get to the Endless UFO mode. In Endless Ufo mode your goal is to get high score.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 720 GT @ 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
